::Autofire::

Autofire chuckles looking around. "Ominous was well equipped, it seems."

Autofire glances at the CR chamber, but decides to let his internal repairs 
do their work. He didn't like CR chambers too much, but they had their uses.

"Would the computers listen to us, though?"
